feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 3:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: ESE 30 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm except 3 cm south of Plum Point. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
